title: 110_hr3872
content: Children Come First Act of 2007 - Amends title XXI (SCHIP) of the Social Security Act to prohibit SCHIP payments for children in families with income between 200 and 300 of the poverty line unless: (1) health insurance coverage for the family is demonstrably unattainable or unaffordable. And (2) the state SCHIP plan permits the family to receive child health assistance through specified optional premium assistance rather than through Medicaid or otherwise.
